reviews.customers_say: Customers find the maternity dress feminine and flattering, with a perfect knee-length that's versatile for both formal and casual occasions.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort Charming
items.body: So adorable. Beautiful fit Light weight. Great quality. Charming sheak! Read more
items.author: Barbara Fritz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars DONâ€™T HESITATE TO BUY!!
items.body: Absolutely LOVE this dress. So comfy!! Not too short. Love the material itâ€™s very soft. Iâ€™m 5â€™6 and weigh about 160 I got a medium. It fits the ðŸ’ AMAZING & makes them look good but not too revealing:) Read more
items.author: Bella

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress
items.body: Much more flattering on than I expected. Bought black for postpartum and it fits nicely in all the areas I was insecure about. Breathable and flowy so nice for a warm day but also works with tall boots and a jacket in cooler weather. Read more
items.author: SamAmazon Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly recommend getting all the colors!
items.body: This dress is so flattering, first of all. I've been self conscious of my tummy since having a baby and this accentuated more of my upper abdomen, below my chest and then flared out nicely, hiding my lower tummy pooch. The V neck is perfect length without dipping too low but still feeling very feminine. The fabric is comfortable and thin enough without being see through. I'd get these in every color. Read more
items.author: Whitney

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not terrible
items.body: I wasnt overly impressed with this dress. The quality of fabric is cheap (think like shein or Temu) I probably could have bought it off there for half the price honestly. I really wish it was softer or even linen. I ordered a size up because I was worried about the tightness of fabric below my bust, and im glad I did because it would have been difficult to get over my shoulders and chest. I normally wear an XL top and I got a XXL. I do like the fact that it is very flowy and the perfect length. Im 5'2" and it hits at the knee and a little longer in the back which is great for us big bum ladies. I was going to return but my husband likes it on me. Also the flowers are a pale yellow, not white in case anyone was wondering. Read more
items.author: Aly Kolley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering, Comfortable and Perfect for Summer!
items.body: This FENSACE sundress is absolutely beautiful. The floral print is bright and feminine, and the fabric feels soft, lightweight, and breathable, perfect for hot days. The fit is true to size and really flattering with the wrap-style neckline and flowy skirt. I love how it moves when I walk and how easy it is to dress up or down with sandals or wedges. It washes well and doesnâ€™t wrinkle easily. Iâ€™ve already worn it to brunch and a summer barbecue, and it got so many compliments. Iâ€™ll definitely be buying another color soon. Read more
items.author: tiffany

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect summer dress
items.body: Adorable summer dress. The fabric is soft,lightweight but not see through ,it came out of the small bag without any wrinkles . For reference I am a solid size 12,pear shaped,the large fit perfectly. Nicely fitted on the top without feeling tight. Love the flutter sleeves. The bottom flairs out a bit. It hits just above the knees. I love the crossover top. On me (38C) it didnâ€™t gape open nor was it too low cut or revealing. I would definitely feel comfortable wearing it to church. It conceals any flaws in your midsection,really flattering on. I bought the red one with little white flowers. Iâ€™m going to order a couple more. You can dress it up with a little heeled sandal or wear casual with a low heeled sandal. Perfect for when you want to look a little polished without going to a lot of fuss. Read more
items.author: sharon m. gonsalves

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit and style
items.body: Soft, flattering and flowy! Read more
items.author: CassieS

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Floral-32, Apricot Floral-78, Blue White Floral-82, Floral-15, Floral-70, Black, Yellow Floral-87, Red White Floral-85, Blue White Paisley-73, Apricot Orange Floral-79, White Blue Floral-63, Floral-44, Floral-27, Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
